subject: Basketball
Sports Injuries
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: The excitement surrounding Baron Davis’s arrival — on a one-year, $1.4 million contract — was necessarily muted, every proclamation qualified by an “if” or a “when” or an “I don’t know.”
